body:
I've gone through and addressed feedback. To fix issues with the stacking indicators etc, I simply rearranged where some elements were in the DOM and didn't have to flex anything. @Osmose Let me know what you think:

![screen shot 2017-05-17 at 1 50 22 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2767162/26173259/6cec3b94-3b08-11e7-8d00-a985c5d6a9ca.png)

If you'd prefer to have it flex'd with the status indicators stacked and the name field flex'd and all that, I can do that, this approach just seemed a bit simpler.

This is ready for review.
